documents.label_am: ዋናውን መውጫ መንገድ ይለዩ (በር ወይም መስኮት)።

documents.label_en: Grab your National/Kebele ID and hide it in your shoe or pocket.
documents.label_am: የቀበሌ መታወቂያዎን ይዘው በኪስዎ ወይም በጫማዎ ውስጥ ይደብቁ።
documents.label_or: Waraqaa eenyummaa keessan adda baafadhaa kofloo keessa kaa'adhaa.

documents.label_en: Put on comfortable walking or running shoes.
Take only your emergency cash and secret phone.
documents.label_am: የአደጋ ጊዜ ገንዘብዎን እና ምስጢራዊ ስልክዎን ብቻ ይያዙ።
documents.label_or: Maallaqa hatattamaa fi bilbila iccitii qofa fudhadhaa.

documents.label_en: Slowly move 50-100 ETB daily to a trusted friend or hidden spot.
documents.label_am: በቀን ከ50-100 ብር ለታመነ ጓደኛ ወይም በድብቅ ቦታ ያስቀምጡ።
documents.label_or: Guyyaatti qarshii 50-100 hiriyaa amanamuuf ykn bakka icciitii kaa'aa.

documents.label_en: Gather original Marriage and Birth Certificates discreetly.
documents.label_am: የጋብቻ እና የልደት ምስክር ወረቀቶችን በድብቅ ያከማቹ።
documents.label_or: Waraqaa ragaa gaa'elaa fi dhalootaa iccitii dhaan sassaabaa.

documents.label_en: Start taking photos of injuries or property damage for the vault.
documents.label_am: ጉዳቶችን ወይም የንብረት ውድመቶችን ፎቶ አንስተው በቮልት ውስጥ ያስቀምጡ።
documents.label_or: Miidhaa qaamaa fi qabeenyaa suuraa kaasaa kuusaa (vault) keessa kaa'aa.

documents.label_en: Identify a room with an outside lock or an exit door.
documents.label_am: የውጪ መቆለፊያ ወይም መውጫ በር ያለው ክፍል ይለዩ።
documents.label_or: Mana hulaa alaa qabu ykn kan keessaan banamu adda baafadhaa.

documents.label_en: Agree on a 'Safe Signal' with a neighbor (e.g. a porch light on).
documents.label_am: ከጎረቤት ጋር 'የደህንነት ምልክት' ይስማሙ (ለምሳሌ መብራት ማብራት)።
documents.label_or: Mallattoo nageenyaa ollaa waliin waliif galii.

documents.label_en: Avoid the kitchen or bathroom during an argument (weapons risk).
documents.label_am: ክርክር በሚፈጠርበት ጊዜ ወጥ ቤት ወይም መታጠቢያ ቤትን ያስወግዱ።
documents.label_or: Yeroo falmiin jiru jikinaa fi mana fincaanii irraa fagaadhaa.

documents.label_en: Log out of your Facebook and Telegram on all shared computers.
documents.label_am: በጋራ ኮምፒተሮች ላይ ከፌስቡክ እና ቴሌግራም አካውንትዎ ይውጡ።
documents.label_or: Kompiitara waliinii irratti Feesbuukii fi Telegiraama keessan cufaa.

documents.label_en: Check Google/Apple Maps for 'Location Sharing' with the abuser.
documents.label_am: በጎግል ማፕ ላይ 'Location Sharing' መብራቱን ያረጋግጡ።
documents.label_or: Google Maps irratti bakka jireenyaa qooduun jiraachuu isaa mirkaneeffadhaa.

documents.label_en: Clear the search history for any NGO or legal aid websites.
documents.label_am: የNGO ወይም የህግ ድጋፍ ድረ-ገጾችን ፍለጋ ታሪክ ያጥፉ።
documents.label_or: Seenaa dubbisa (search history) marsariitiiwwan gargaarsaa haquu.

documents.label_en: Teach children a secret 'Code Word' to signal they must hide.
documents.label_am: ልጆች እንዲደበቁ የሚያደርጋቸው ሚስጥራዊ 'የኮድ ቃል' ያስተምሯቸው።
documents.label_or: Daa'imman mallattoo iccitii akka dhokatan isaan barsiisaa.

documents.label_en: Secure your children's original immunization and birth records.
documents.label_am: የልጆችዎን የክትባት እና የልደት ካርዶች ደህንነቱ በተጠበቀ ቦታ ይያዙ።
documents.label_or: Waraqaa ragaa talaallii fi dhalootaa daa'immanii bakka nagaa kaa'aa.

documents.label_en: Plan a meeting spot outside the house if you get separated.
documents.label_am: ከተለያዩ በኋላ የሚገናኙበትን ቦታ ከቤት ውጭ ይወስኑ።
documents.label_or: Yoo gargar baatan bakka itti wal argattan alatti murteessaa.
